name: 600 second survival
description:
Zombies have taken over the world! You belong to the few lucky ones who are still alive. Can you survive ten minutes in this cruel and demanding world while zombies all around you are trying to kill you?  Take on this new challenge!

WASD to move, mouse 1 to shoot and aim, R to reload. you can change your gun by pressing 1, 2 or 3 after you have bought the gun. 

All music tracks can be found here: https://soundcloud.com/wadur/sets/600-second-survival
